columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the rule.

columns.name: event_bus_name
columns.description: The name or ARN of the event bus associated with the rule.

columns.name: created_by
columns.description: The account ID of the user that created the rule.

columns.name: managed_by
columns.description: If this is a managed rule, created by an AWS service on your behalf, this field displays the principal name of the AWS service that created the rule.

columns.name: event_pattern
columns.description: The event pattern of the rule.

columns.name: name_prefix
columns.description: Specifying this limits the results to only those event rules with names that start with the specified prefix.

columns.name: targets
columns.description: The targets assigned to the rule.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags assigned to the rule.
